short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Phrase words Encryptor Chrome Extension to secure your crypto recovery phrases.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ShieldMySeed is a cutting-edge Chrome extension designed to provide crypto enthusiasts with a secure, user-friendly way to safeguard their cryptocurrency recovery phrases (also known as seed phrases). In the world of cryptocurrency, recovery phrases are crucial for regaining access to wallets and digital assets. ShieldMySeed addresses the security risks associated with storing and managing these phrases by offering advanced encryption and decryption features, ensuring your recovery phrases are protected at all times.
